Medium: Commercial black and white photography and color lithography
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1900 A.D.–present
Description: Trade cards from the "1954 Topps Regular Issue" series (R414-8), issued as 250 card set in 1954 by Topps Chewing Gum Company. Number 37 in series- red number on green stitch ball on verso.
